title: Morgana's E (Black Shield)
body:
I think I'm noticing a weird trend throughout this patch 6.8. Morgana's E is not blocking some crowd control abilities. For example, Leblanc chains land while I have the shield on, and root me in position while the shield is still on.
Just at random times the shield seems to be bugged.

Anyone else seen this effect recently?

replies.body: noticed things like that with yasuo's windwall

I personally haven't encountered this (and I play a lot of Morgana).

See if you can re-recreate it in a custom game, just to make sure it isn't a one-off or a human error.

If it happens again, head [over on this board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), and check if it has been described. If not, feel free to add it to the list :D

Remember to [adhere to the proper protocol](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) when doing so ♥

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Yaia,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=wvJwUMuE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-02T01:44:04.047+0000)
>
> I personally haven't encountered this (and I play a lot of Morgana).
> 
> See if you can re-recreate it in a custom game, just to make sure it isn't a one-off or a human error.
> 
> If it happens again, head [over on this board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), and check if it has been described. If not, feel free to add it to the list :D
> 
> Remember to [adhere to the proper protocol](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) when doing so ♥

Thanks for your reply. I had a look through the NA bug section but couldn't find anything resembling the issue. In today's games the bug hasn't re-occured, but it was freakish yesterday. I'll send something in if it happens again.
